fields.name: Numbers 14:21
fields.value: 21 But as truly as I live, all the earth shall be filled with the glory of the Lord.

fields.name: Habakkuk 2:14
fields.value: 14 For the earth shall be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD, as the waters cover the sea.

fields.name: Psalm 112:1
fields.value: 1 Praise ye the LORD. Blessed is the man that feareth the LORD, that delighteth greatly in his commandments.

fields.name: Proverbs 9:10
fields.value: 10 The fear of the Lord is the beginning of wisdom: and the knowledge of the holy is understanding.

fields.name: James 1:5-8
fields.value:
5 If any of you lack wisdom, let him ask of God, that giveth to all men liberally, and upbraideth not; and it shall be given him.

6 But let him ask in faith, nothing wavering. For he that wavereth is like a wave of the sea driven with the wind and tossed.

7 For let not that man think that he shall receive any thing of the Lord.

8 A double minded man is unstable in all his ways.

fields.name: Note
fields.value: God promises that He will give us and fill us with wisdom and knowledge, only if we study to get that knowledge.

fields.name: 2 Timothy 2:15
fields.value: 15 Study to shew thyself approved unto God, a workman that needeth not to be ashamed, rightly dividing the word of truth.

fields.name: Summary
fields.value: God is willing to give us understanding and knowledge of the scriptures and truths, but we have got to work for it.
